item.title: Z 世代推动英国消费者信心达到今年最高点
item.description: 英国消费者信心跃升至今年以来的最高水平，这主要得益于最低工资上调后 Z 世代乐观情绪的高涨。【原文：UK consumer confidence jumped to its highest level this year, boosted by rising optimism among Generation Z after the latest increase in the minimum wage.】

item.title: 英国央行将维持利率不变 石油构成新威胁
item.description: 预计英国央行周四将把利率维持在 4.25%，并表示将坚持 "每次会议一次降息 "的做法，因为英国央行官员正试图在通胀上升、油价上涨和经济放缓之间取得平衡。【原文：The Bank of England is expected to keep interest rates at 4.25% on Thursday and signal it is sticking with its one-cut-every-other-meeting approach as officials try to strike a balance between elevated inflation, higher oil prices and a slowing economy.】

item.title: 富达和贝莱德瞄准中国对离岸基金的需求
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，富达国际准备推出一些产品，吸引追逐海外基金高回报的内地投资者。【原文：Fidelity International is poised to offer products that attract mainland investors chasing higher returns from overseas funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 出口跃升，新西兰经济复苏步伐加快
item.description: 随着中央银行降低利率和出口激增，新西兰经济在第一季度加快了从 2024 年衰退中复苏的步伐。【原文：New Zealand’s economic recovery from a 2024 recession gathered pace in the first quarter as the central bank lowered interest rates and exports surged.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称利率路径不明但关税影响即将到来
item.description: 经济和利率前景存在很多未知数，但美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）发出的信号至少有一点似乎是肯定的：更高的价格即将到来。【原文：There’s a lot of unknowns about the outlook for the economy and interest rates, but Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell signaled at least one thing seems certain: Higher prices are coming.】

item.title: 恩西诺计划在 56 亿美元的 EOG 交易中裁减 121 个休斯顿职位
item.description: 据德克萨斯州劳动力委员会称，上个月同意以 56 亿美元出售给 EOG 资源公司的尤蒂卡石油& 天然气钻探商 Encino Energy LLC 正计划在其休斯顿地区办事处裁员 121 人。【原文：Encino Energy LLC, the Utica oil & gas driller that agreed to a $5.6 billion sale to EOG Resources Inc. last month, is planning to cut 121 workers at its Houston-area office, according to the Texas Workforce Commission.】

item.title: 美联储发出通胀警告后亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，他预计通胀率将在未来几个月有意义地回升，亚洲股市周四低开。【原文：Asian equities were primed to open lower Thursday after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said he expects inflation to pickup meaningfully in the coming months.】

item.title: 亿万富翁戴志康将从高通交易中获得 2.37 亿美元意外之财
item.description: 戴伟立（Weili Dai）的职业生涯是帮助一家又一家科技初创企业走向成功。现在，这位连续创业者即将从其中一家公司获得一笔意外之财：Alphawave IP Group Plc 公司即将出售给高通公司（Qualcomm Inc.【原文：Weili Dai has built a career helping turn tech startup after tech startup into successful ventures. The serial entrepreneur is now poised to pocket a windfall from one of them: $237 million from the pending sale of Alphawave IP Group Plc to Qualcomm Inc.】

item.title: 中国顶级酱油制造商将在香港开始交易
item.description: 中国最大的酱油生产商佛山海天调味食品股份有限公司将于本周四在香港开始交易，此前该公司以 101 亿港元（13 亿美元）发行股票，吸引了投资者的强烈需求。【原文：Foshan Haitian Flavouring & Food Co., China’s biggest soy sauce maker, will begin trading in Hong Kong on Thursday after its HK$10.1 billion ($1.3 billion) stock offering drew strong demand from investors.】

item.title: 巴西将利率上调至 15%，强劲经济助长通胀
item.description: 巴西央行将其关键利率上调了四分之一个百分点，并表示可能会暂停货币紧缩政策，以评估其对通货膨胀和经济活动的影响。【原文：Brazil’s central bank raised its key interest rate by a quarter-point, saying it will likely pause its monetary tightening campaign to gauge its impact on inflation and economic activity.】

item.title: 亚马逊命令员工迁往西雅图和其他中心
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）正在命令一些公司员工搬到离他们的经理和团队更近的地方，这让本已担心裁员和高层警告人工智能将在未来几年缩减员工队伍的员工感到不安。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is ordering some corporate employees to move closer to their managers and teams, roiling a workforce already worried about job cuts and warnings from the top that artificial intelligence will shrink their ranks in the coming years.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司努力支付巴西预算所需的额外红利
item.description: 国家控股的石油生产商巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）正在努力支付超常红利，政府今年指望这些红利来支撑公共财政。【原文：State-controlled oil producer Petrobras is making an effort to pay extraordinary dividends that the government is counting on this year to shore up public finances.】

item.title: 索马里成立首个交易所交易股票和苏克债券
item.description: 索马里将于明年初开始在一个新的交易所交易股票和政府发行的伊斯兰债券，这个非洲之角的国家正在努力融入地区和全球金融市场。【原文：Somalia will begin trading equities and government-issued sukuk bonds on a new exchange early next year, as the Horn of Africa nation seeks integration into regional and global financial markets.】

item.title: 关税不确定性导致台湾维持基准利率不变
item.description: 考虑到对关税、经济和通胀的担忧，台湾很可能连续第五个季度维持基准利率不变--尽管本币的飙升为降息提供了一些动力。【原文：Taiwan is likely to hold its benchmark interest rate for the fifth straight quarter as it considers worries about tariffs, the economy and inflation – though a surge in the local currency provides some incentive for a cut.】

item.title: 美国可转债创 2021 年以来最大单周收益，呼应科威德热潮
item.description: 美国的可转换债券在本周创下了四年多来的最佳表现，需求激增使企业能够以大流行病以来少见的低价进入市场。【原文：Convertible bonds in the US had their best week in more than four years, with surging demand enabling companies to tap the market at low prices rarely seen since the pandemic.】

item.title: 外国国债持有量在四月动荡中接近创纪录水平
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划实施一个多世纪以来最大规模的关税上调，导致金融市场动荡不安，但外国投资者持有的美国国债在 4 月份仍接近历史最高水平。【原文：Foreign investors’ holdings of US Treasuries held close to a record high in April, despite the turmoil in financial markets in the wake of President Donald Trump’s plans for the biggest tariff hikes in more than a century.】

item.title: 美国计划在得克萨斯州建立设施防治食肉牛害虫
item.description: 美国农业部宣布了一项计划，将在得克萨斯州南部建立一个价值 850 万美元的设施，以防止新世界螺旋虫的传播。【原文：The US Department of Agriculture announced a plan to open an $8.5 million facility in South Texas to combat the spread of the New World screwworm, a flesh-eating bug that is deadly to cattle.】

item.title: Blackstone 抢购 Meta 租赁的办公楼股权
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 的房地产业务购买了华盛顿州贝尔维尤两处办公物业的股权，这两处物业由 Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s real estate business purchased stakes in two office properties in Bellevue, Washington, that are leased by Meta Platforms Inc.】

item.title: 捷克政府在大选前数月赢得信任投票
item.description: 捷克政府经受住了反对派就比特币丑闻发起的信任投票，在定于 10 月举行的议会选举前挺过了这场动荡。【原文：The Czech government survived a confidence vote initiated by the opposition over a Bitcoin scandal, shouldering through the turmoil ahead of a parliamentary election scheduled for October.】

item.title: Fibra Next 希望在定于七月举行的首次公开募股中筹资 5.25 亿美元
item.description: 墨西哥房地产投资信托公司 Fibra Next 将于 7 月初通过首次公开募股筹集约 100 亿比索（约合 5.25 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Mexican real estate investment trust Fibra Next will look to raise around 10 billion pesos ($525 million) through an initial public offering in early July.】

item.title: Coinbase 签订协议，允许将 USDC 稳定币用作抵押品
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc. 已经签署了一项协议，将全球第二大稳定币 USDC 用作美国期货交易的抵押品。该加密货币交易所还在扩大其支付服务，包括在电子商务商家网站上整合 USDC。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. has inked a deal to have the world’s second-biggest stablecoin, USDC, used as collateral in US futures trading. The cryptocurrency exchange is also expanding its payment offerings, including integrating USDC on ecommerce merchant sites.】

item.title: 一家与特朗普儿子有关联的小投资银行帮助撮合了 1.2 亿美元的交易收益
item.description: 本周，小唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump Jr.）和埃里克-特朗普（Eric Trump）担任顾问的一家小型投资银行帮助一家默默无闻的玩具制造商进军加密货币领域，使其股价上涨超过 500%。上个月，同一家银行帮助安排的股票押注为该公司带来了超过 1.2 亿美元的收益。【原文：A tiny investment bank where Donald Trump Jr. and Eric Trump work as advisers helped an obscure toymaker pivot into crypto this week, sending its shares up more than 500%. The run-up generated more than $120 million in gains on a stock bet the same bank helped arrange last month.】

item.title: 特朗普再次推迟美国的 TikTok 禁令。下一步是什么？
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统在就任第二任总统之初采取的首批行动之一就是批准暂缓执行 TikTok 法案。两个半月后，他又批准了第二次暂缓执行，6 月 18 日，他承诺将批准第三次暂缓执行。【原文：One of the first actions President Donald Trump took at the outset of his second presidency was granting a stay of execution for TikTok. Two and a half months later, he granted a second, and on June 18, he promised a third.】

item.title: 特朗普顾问大卫-萨克斯称中国善于规避芯片禁令
item.description: 白宫加密和人工智能沙皇大卫-萨克斯（David Sacks）警告说，中国已经越来越善于规避美国的出口管制，其半导体设计能力最多比美国落后两年。【原文：White House crypto and artificial intelligence czar David Sacks warned that China has grown adept at evading US export controls and is at most two years behind American semiconductor design capabilities.】

item.title: 微软计划针对销售人员再裁员数千人
item.description: 微软公司正计划裁减数千个工作岗位，尤其是销售岗位，这是该公司在人工智能领域投入巨资、裁员的最新举措之一。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is planning to ax thousands of jobs, particularly in sales, as part of the company’s latest move to trim its workforce amid heavy spending on artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 规模人工智能竞争对手在元投资后客户需求激增
item.description: 当 Meta Platforms 公司计划向数据标签初创公司 Scale AI 投资数十亿美元的消息传出时，亚历克斯-拉特纳（Alex Ratner）正试图在哄孩子睡觉后工作几个小时。几分钟之内，经营着竞争对手 Snorkel AI 公司的拉特纳就开始接到董事会的电话，询问是否有机会接手担心 Scale 独立性的客户。【原文：Alex Ratner was trying to get in a few hours of work after putting his kids to bed when news broke that Meta Platforms Inc. planned to invest billions of dollars in data-labeling startup Scale AI. Within minutes, Ratner, who runs a rival company called Snorkel AI, began fielding calls from his board about the chance to pick up clients worried about Scale’s independence.】

item.title: 美联储坚持 2025 年两次降息计划，国债反弹
item.description: 在美联储官员表示今年仍将降息两个季度后，美国国债上涨，支持了债券交易员的类似预期。【原文：US Treasuries rose after Federal Reserve officials indicated they’re still on course to deliver two quarter-point interest-rate reductions this year, backing similar expectations held by bond traders.】

item.title: 纽约市拥堵收费将曼哈顿的交通拥堵减少 25
item.description: 区域计划协会的一份新报告显示，纽约市的拥堵收费政策已将曼哈顿的交通延误减少了 25%，并将附近新泽西州各县的交通堵塞减少了 14%，从而消除了人们对该政策将使纽约市外交通状况恶化的担忧。【原文：New York City’s congestion pricing toll has cut Manhattan traffic delays by 25% and reduced gridlock in nearby New Jersey counties by as much as 14%, undercutting fears the policy would worsen traffic outside the city, a new report from the Regional Plan Association shows.】

item.title: 欧洲通信卫星组织签订协议，为法国提供军用卫星服务
item.description: 法国卫星运营商欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat SA）周三与法国政府达成了一项为期 10 年的协议，为法国军队提供连接服务。【原文：French satellite operator Eutelsat SA struck a 10-year deal with the French government on Wednesday to provide connectivity to the country’s military.】

item.title: 油价为何与地缘政治威胁脱钩
item.description:
在本期特朗普经济学节目中，我们将讨论以色列对伊朗的突然袭击以及由此引发的战争如何没有对能源市场产生预期的影响。【原文：

On this episode of Trumponomics, we discuss how Israel’s surprise attack on Iran and the resulting war aren’t having the expected effects on energy markets.

】
